scripts.postinstall: mkdir ./bin && GOBIN=$GOPATH/bin go install github.com/a-h/templ/cmd/templ@latest && cp $GOPATH/bin/templ ./bin & GOBIN=$GOPATH/bin go install github.com/sqlc-dev/sqlc/cmd/sqlc@latest && cp $GOPATH/bin/sqlc ./bin & GOBIN=$GOPATH/bin go install -tags 'postgres' github.com/golang-migrate/migrate/v4/cmd/migrate@latest && cp $GOPATH/bin/migrate ./bin & GOBIN=$GOPATH/bin go install github.com/cosmtrek/air@latest && cp $GOPATH/bin/air ./bin
